snippet: Women lost fewer jobs than men during the recession, but since the total number of workers hit bottom in December 2009, the bulk of the new jobs have gone to men.
lead_paragraph: Women lost fewer jobs than men during the recession, but since the total number of workers hit bottom in December 2009, the bulk of the new jobs have gone to men.

headline.seo: Off the Charts: It’s a Man’s Recovery
headline.main: Off the Charts: It’s a Man’s Recovery
